description: A uniform SST increase taken from each model's global, climatological annual mean SST change between abrupt4xCO2 and the piControl (using the mean of years 111-140 of abrupt4xCO2, and the parallel 30-year section of piControl).
name: piControl SST Monthly Var Plus Uniform xK
rationale: To provide uniform SST increase to the piSST-pxK experiment for CFMIP.
longName: Monthly-varying sea surface temperatures from the pre-industrial control simulation plus uniform xK
keywords: sea surface temperature, piControl, pre-industrial control, SST, monthly-varying, plus uniform SST xK, SST +xK
